attachments.title: URGENT! 1-YR. OLD DOG HAS ONLY HOURS TO FIND FOSTER OR PERMANENT HOME!
attachments.text: CHANCE in Portland, Oregon is a super smart, 1-year old pup who needs a foster or forever home now! Chance was rescued from a homeless camp where he was abandoned. His temporary foster home ends on...
attachments.fallback: craigslist: URGENT! 1-YR. OLD DOG HAS ONLY HOURS TO FIND FOSTER OR PERMANENT HOME!

text: Aww poor pupster! I wish I had a yard... but I'm reaching out to a few other friends who might be able to help!
